BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Betty Y. Chen to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the City Planning Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 192 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Betty Y. Chen, City Planning Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Nancy G. Chaffetz to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment to the New York City Civil Service Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 813 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nancy G. Chaffetz, New York City Civil Service Commission

Items.Title: Robert L. Cohen, M.D., candidate for appointment by the Council to the New York City Board of Correction pursuant to ยง 626 of the New York City Charter. If Dr. Cohen is appointed, he will be eligible to serve for the remainder of a six-year term expiring on October 12, 2011.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Robert L. Cohen, M.D., New York City Board of Correction.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
